statements: SELECT * FROM player_interactions;
SELECT player_id, other_player_id, interaction_type FROM player_interactions;
SELECT * FROM player_interactions WHERE player_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM player_interactions WHERE other_player_id = 2;
SELECT player_id, other_player_id, interaction_type, interaction_timestamp FROM player_interactions ORDER BY interaction_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM player_interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'friend_request';
SELECT player_id, other_player_id, interaction_timestamp FROM player_interactions WHERE player_id = 123 AND other_player_id = 456 ORDER BY interaction_timestamp DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_interactions FROM player_interactions;
SELECT player_id, COUNT(*) AS interactions_count FROM player_interactions GROUP BY player_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 5 ORDER BY interactions_count DESC;

SELECT interaction_type, DATE_TRUNC('day', interaction_timestamp) AS interaction_date, COUNT(*) AS total_interactions FROM player_interactions GROUP BY interaction_type, interaction_date ORDER BY interaction_date ASC,total_interactions DESC;
SELECT * FROM player_interactions;
SELECT player_id, interaction_type FROM player_interactions WHERE interaction_type='Like';
SELECT player_id, collaboration_type FROM player_collaborations WHERE collaboration_type='Co-op' ORDER BY collaboration_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM player_interactions WHERE player_id=1001;
SELECT player1_id, player2_id FROM player_collaborations WHERE collaboration_type='Teamwork' ORDER BY collaboration_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM player_interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'like' ORDER BY interaction_timestamp DESC;
SELECT player_id, interaction_type, interaction_description FROM player_interactions WHERE player_id = 1001;
SELECT player_id, interaction_type, interaction_timestamp FROM player_interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'message' ORDER BY interaction_timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM player_collaborations WHERE collaboration_type = 'teamwork' ORDER BY collaboration_timestamp DESC;
SELECT player1_id, player2_id, collaboration_timestamp FROM player_collaborations WHERE collaboration_type = 'partnership' ORDER BY collaboration_timestamp ASC;
SELECT player_name, player_level FROM players;
SELECT * FROM collaborations WHERE collaboration_type = 'quest';
SELECT player_id, interaction_type, interaction_time FROM interactions ORDER BY interaction_time DESC;
SELECT player_name, player_experience FROM players WHERE player_level > 10;
SELECT * FROM players JOIN collaborations ON players.player_id = collaborations.player_id;
SELECT player_id, player_name, player_level FROM players WHERE player_level > 10 ORDER BY player_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'trade' AND interaction_time >= '2022-01-01 00:00:00' ORDER BY interaction_time DESC;
SELECT player_id, MAX(player_level) AS max_level FROM players GROUP BY player_id;
SELECT player_name, SUM(player_experience) AS total_experience FROM players GROUP BY player_name HAVING total_experience > 5000 ORDER BY total_experience DESC;

SELECT collaborations.collaboration_type, players.player_name FROM collaborations INNER JOIN players ON collaborations.player_id = players.player_id WHERE collaborations.collaboration_time >= '2022-01-01' AND collaborations.collaboration_time <= '2022-12-31' ORDER BY collaborations.collaboration_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM PlayerInteractions;
SELECT player_id, interaction_type, interaction_timestamp FROM PlayerInteractions ORDER BY interaction_timestamp DESC;
SELECT player_id, interaction_type FROM PlayerInteractions WHERE player_id = 1;
SELECT player_id, interaction_type, interaction_timestamp FROM PlayerInteractions WHERE interaction_type = 'login' ORDER BY interaction_timestamp ASC;
SELECT player1_id, player2_id, collaboration_timestamp FROM PlayerCollaborations ORDER BY collaboration_timestamp DESC;
SELECT player_id, interaction_type FROM PlayerInteractions WHERE player_id = 1;
SELECT collaboration_id, collaboration_timestamp, player1_id, player2_id FROM PlayerCollaborations WHERE collaboration_timestamp < '2022-01-01';
SELECT player_id, game_id, session_duration FROM GameSessions WHERE session_duration > '1 hour';
SELECT game_id, score, completion_status FROM GameStatistics WHERE score >= 100 AND completion_status = TRUE;
SELECT player_id, interaction_timestamp, interaction_type FROM PlayerInteractions WHERE interaction_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT * FROM players;
SELECT player_name, player_score FROM players WHERE player_level > 5;
SELECT player_id, player_name FROM players WHERE player_score > 1000 ORDER BY player_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM games WHERE genre = 'Adventure' ORDER BY release_date DESC;
SELECT player1_id, player2_id, collaboration_type FROM player_collaborations WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM players;
SELECT player_name, player_score FROM players WHERE player_level > 5;
SELECT player_id, player_name, player_level, player_score FROM players ORDER BY player_score DESC;
SELECT player_name, p.player_score, g.game_name, ps.play_time FROM players p JOIN player_sessions ps ON p.player_id = ps.player_id JOIN games g ON ps.game_id = g.game_id;
SELECT player_name, player_score, interaction_type FROM players p JOIN player_interactions pi ON p.player_id = pi.player_id WHERE pi.interaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
